page.title: 03THE CIVIC HALL
page.content: THE CIVIC HALL IS NEW AND WAS FUNDED BY THE TOWN COUNCIL.IT COST 500,000 POUNDS TO COMPLETE.THE FULL SEATING CAPACITY IS 520 PEOPLE.IT CONSISTS OF A MAIN HALL,WITH A FULL STAGE,PROPS.ROOM,DRESSING ROOMS AND STAGE LIGHTING,AND A BAR;A SMALL HALL;A CONFERENCE ROOM;A KITCHEN;A WORKSHOP.IT IS USED FOR SPORTING ACTIVITIES E.G. KARATE AND BADMINTON,FOR COUNCIL MEETINGS,FOR DRAMATIC PRODUCTIONS,MUSICAL ACTIVITIES AND PRIVATE FUNCTIONS.IT HAS BECOME EXTREMELY POPULAR AND IS USUALLY VERY HEAVILY BOOKED .IT PROVIDES GOOD CENTRAL FACILITIES FOR THE COMMUNITY.THE MANAGER IS MR.TONY NEW.
